name: Property Status
query:
SELECT  p.name AS "Property:Link/Property:150",
        p.type AS "Property Type:Data:150",
        p.bedroom AS "BHK:Data:50",
        p.builtup_area AS "Builtup Area:Data:100",
        p.carpet_area AS "Carper Area:Data:100",
        p.unit_owner AS "Unit Owner:Link/Customer:150",
        c.customer_group AS "Owner Type:Data:150",
        l.lease_customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:150",
        l.end_date AS "End Date:Date:100",
        l.lease_status AS "Status:Data:80",
        l.name AS "Lease:Link/Lease:100",
        l.security_deposit_currency AS "Currency:Data:50",
        l.security_deposit AS "Amount:Float:100",
        l.security_status AS "Security Status:Data:100",
        GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT_WS('-',li.lease_item,FORMAT(li.amount,2)) SEPARATOR ' | ') AS "Lease Details:Data:400"
FROM `tabProperty` p left join `tabLease` l on p.name = l.property
                     LEFT JOIN `tabLease Item` li on l.name = li.parent
                  left join `tabCustomer` c on p.unit_owner = c.name
WHERE p.type LIKE concat("%%", IF(%(property_type)s = " " , "", %(property_type)s), "%%")
AND c.customer_group LIKE concat("%%", IF(%(owner_type)s = " " , "", %(owner_type)s), "%%")
GROUP by p.name
ORDER BY p.name
